languages.text: "Простор пылает, Ваша Светлость. Эскадры и малые группы презренных друкари совершают рейды по нашим системам. Культ Последнего восхода наконец показал свою силу и сеет смуту повсюду. До нас доходили слухи, что мир династии Чорда, Гордость Сантиэля, пал... Возмутительное святотатство, учитывая, сколь дешевый и изобильный прометий добывался на этой планете!"

traits.locale_text: "Простор пылает, Ваша Светлость. Эскадры и малые группы презренных друкари совершают рейды по нашим системам. Культ Последнего восхода наконец показал свою силу и сеет смуту повсюду. До нас доходили слухи, что мир династии Чорда Гордость Сантиэля пал... Возмутительное святотатство, учитывая, сколь дешевый и изобильный прометий добывался на этой планете!"

languages.text: "The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and smaller groups of despicable Drukhari raid our systems. The Cult of the Final Dawn has emerged in full force, wreaking havoc everywhere. We've heard rumours of the fall of Santiel's Pride, House Chorda's world... An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"
languages.original_text: "Простор пылает, Ваша Светлость. Эскадры и малые группы презренных друкари совершают рейды по нашим системам. Культ Последнего восхода наконец показал свою силу и сеет смуту повсюду. До нас доходили слухи, что мир династии Чорда, Гордость Сантиэля, пал... Возмутительное святотатство, учитывая, сколь дешевый и изобильный прометий добывался на этой планете!"

traits.locale_text: "The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and small groups of the wretched Drukhari are raiding our systems. The Cult of the Final Dawn has come out in full force, stirring up revolts everywhere. Rumours reached us of the fall of House Chorda's world of Santiel's Pride... Such a deplorable sacrilege, considering the abundance of cheap promethium mined on that world!"

"The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and small groups of the wretched Drukhari are raiding our systems. The Cult of the Final Dawn has come out in full force, stirring up revolts everywhere. Rumours reached us of the fall of House Chorda's world of Santiel's Pride... Such a deplorable sacrilege, considering the abundance of cheap promethium mined on that world!"

An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"

"The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and smaller groups of despicable Drukhari raid our systems. An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"

The Cult of the Final Dawn has emerged in full force, wreaking havoc everywhere. We've heard rumours of the fall of Santiel's Pride, House Chorda's world... An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"

"The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and smaller groups of despicable Drukhari raid our systems. The Cult of the Final Dawn has emerged in full force, wreaking havoc everywhere. We've heard rumours of the fall of Santiel's Pride, House Chorda's world... An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"

languages.text: «La Extensión es pasto de las llamas, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Escuadrones enteros y grupos más reducidos de esos viles Drukhari asaltan nuestros sistemas. El Culto del Amanecer Final se ha alzado en armas, sembrando el caos por todas partes. Hemos oído rumores sobre la caída de Orgullo de Santiel, el mundo de la casa Chorda... ¡Un sacrilegio terrible, habida cuenta de lo abundante y barato que es allí el prometio!».
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and smaller groups of despicable Drukhari raid our systems. The Cult of the Final Dawn has emerged in full force, wreaking havoc everywhere. We've heard rumours of the fall of Santiel's Pride, House Chorda's world... An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"

traits.locale_text: «La Extensión es pasto de las llamas, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Escuadrones enteros y grupos más reducidos de esos viles Drukhari asaltan nuestros sistemas. El Culto del Amanecer Final se ha alzado en armas, sembrando el caos por todas partes. Hemos oído rumores sobre la caída de Orgullo de Santiel, el mundo de la casa Chorda... ¡Un sacrilegio terrible, habida cuenta de lo abundante y barato que es allí el prometio!».

languages.text: “科罗努斯扩区在熊熊燃烧，大人。大大小小的黑暗灵族舰队不断地袭击我们的星系，终末黎明邪教也开始全面肆虐。我们听说库尔达家族的世界，桑提尔之傲沦陷了……因为那里有大量而廉价的钷素储备，这简直是无耻的亵渎！”
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and smaller groups of despicable Drukhari raid our systems. The Cult of the Final Dawn has emerged in full force, wreaking havoc everywhere. We've heard rumours of the fall of Santiel's Pride, House Chorda's world... An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"

traits.locale_text: “科罗努斯扩区在熊熊燃烧，大人。大大小小的黑暗灵族舰队不断地袭击我们的星系，终末黎明邪教也开始全面肆虐。我们听说库尔达家族的世界，桑提尔之傲沦陷了……因为那里有大量而廉价的钷素储备，这简直是无耻的亵渎！”

languages.text: « Les Étendues sont en flammes, Votre Seigneurie. Des escadrons et de petits groupes de Drukharis attaquent nos systèmes. Le Culte de l'Aube finale a surgi en force et sème la terreur partout. Nous avons également entendu des rumeurs disant que la Gloire de Santiel, le monde de la maison Chorda, serait tombée... C'est là un sacrilège inqualifiable, compte tenu de la quantité de prométhium bon marché que l'on peut y trouver ! »
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and smaller groups of despicable Drukhari raid our systems. The Cult of the Final Dawn has emerged in full force, wreaking havoc everywhere. We've heard rumours of the fall of Santiel's Pride, House Chorda's world... An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"

traits.locale_text: « Les Étendues sont en flammes, Votre Seigneurie. Des escadrons et de petits groupes de Drukharis attaquent nos systèmes. Le Culte de l'Aube finale a surgi en force et sème la terreur partout. Nous avons également entendu des rumeurs disant que la Gloire de Santiel, le monde de la maison Chorda, serait tombée... C'est là un sacrilège inqualifiable, compte tenu de la quantité de prométhium bon marché que l'on peut y trouver ! »

languages.text: 「エクスパンスは燃え上がっています、陛下。卑劣なデュカーリの部隊や小集団が我々の星系を襲撃しているのです。さらには、最後の夜明け魔女団が勢力を拡大し、至る所で大混乱を引き起こしています。サンティエル・プライド、チョーダ家の惑星の滅亡の噂も耳にしております…プロメチウムがどれほど豊富で安価であるかと考えれば、恐るべき冒涜と言えましょう！」
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and smaller groups of despicable Drukhari raid our systems. The Cult of the Final Dawn has emerged in full force, wreaking havoc everywhere. We've heard rumours of the fall of Santiel's Pride, House Chorda's world... An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"

traits.locale_text: 「エクスパンスは燃え上がっています、陛下。卑劣なデュカーリの部隊や小集団が我々の星系を襲撃しているのです。さらには、最後の夜明け魔女団が勢力を拡大し、至る所で大混乱を引き起こしています。サンティエル・プライド、チョーダ家の惑星の滅亡の噂も耳にしております…プロメチウムがどれほど豊富で安価であるかと考えれば、恐るべき冒涜と言えましょう！」

languages.text: "Die Ausdehnung steht in Flammen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Geschwader und kleinere Gruppen verhasster Drukhari überfallen unsere Systeme. Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung ist erstarkt und sorgt überall für Chaos und Zerstörung. Es gibt Gerüchte, dass Santiels Stolz gefallen sei, die Welt von Haus Chorda ... Ein unerhörtes Sakrileg, wenn man bedenkt, wie reich die Welt an günstigem Promethium ist!"
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and smaller groups of despicable Drukhari raid our systems. The Cult of the Final Dawn has emerged in full force, wreaking havoc everywhere. We've heard rumours of the fall of Santiel's Pride, House Chorda's world... An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Ausdehnung steht in Flammen, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Geschwader und kleinere Gruppen verhasster Drukhari überfallen unsere Systeme. Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung ist erstarkt und sorgt überall für Chaos und Zerstörung. Es gibt Gerüchte, dass Santiels Stolz gefallen sei, die Welt von Haus Chorda ... Ein unerhörtes Sakrileg, wenn man bedenkt, wie reich die Welt an günstigem Promethium ist!"

languages.text: "Enginlik, alevler içinde {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Eskadralar ve aşağılık Drukhari grupları sistemlerimize baskın düzenliyor. Nihai Şafak Tarikatı güçlü bir şekilde ortaya çıkıp her yerde savaş rüzgârları estiriyor. Santiel'in Gururu, Chorda Hanesi'nin dünyasının düştüğüne dair söylentiler duyuyoruz... Prometyumun orada ne kadar bol ve ucuz olduğunu düşünürsek ne büyük bir hürmetsizlik!"
languages.original_text: "The Expanse is in flames, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Squadrons and smaller groups of despicable Drukhari raid our systems. The Cult of the Final Dawn has emerged in full force, wreaking havoc everywhere. We've heard rumours of the fall of Santiel's Pride, House Chorda's world... An outrageous sacrilege, given how abundant and inexpensive promethium is there!"

Prometyumun orada ne kadar bol ve ucuz olduğunu düşünürsek ne büyük bir hürmetsizlik!"
